column1: vladimir-tochilovsky-262b6040,Vladimir,Tochilovsky,Formerly ICTY and UN Working Group on Arbitrary Detention,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E03AQEwc8peraYOeQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1688221101138?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=8akTxKqfX80R2XTrzTFbscYJagTPMfP2nyVKLG19tHk,,personal,ACoAAAi2q2oB0YYYIQ51WzJaVJqe9U8wuYNBR2k,146189162,,"- Ph.D in Law. authored numerous publications, including books, on international criminal justice and human rights in criminal justice
- Special Adviser to the ICC Prosecutor Oct 2021 – present
- The Eastern European member (Vice-Chair) of the  United Nations Working Group on Arbitrary Detention 2010-2016
- Trial Attorney and Investigation Team Leader in the  United Nations International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia 1994-2010
- Deputy Procurator for judicial matters of Odesa region (population over 2 million) 1987-1994
- Taught at Mechnikov National University, Odesa, Ukraine 1991 – 1994
- Official representative of the ICTY to the UN negotiations for the establishment of the International Criminal Court, 1997-2001
- Expert of the selected group of experts which prepared recommendations for the International Criminal Court 2002-2003
- Member of the independent Advisory Panel of the Commission for International Justice and Accountability 2013-present

- Expert of the International Expert Framework for the Codification of International Criminal Procedure 2008-2011.","{'country': None, 'short': 'Netherlands', 'city': None, 'state': None, 'default': 'Netherlands'}",False,False,[],"{'primary_locale': {'country': 'US', 'language': 'en'}, 'supported_locales': [{'country': 'US', 'language': 'en'}], 'profile_languages': []}",Law Practice,"[{'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'school': {'name': 'Odessa I.I.Mechnikov National University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF_zG8G0AXlfw/company-logo_400_400/0/1591778693225?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=v8DeJkRVCbr2QX2rJXX45dATiGc_s_EOfiyxZQo7hqc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/odessa-national-university/'}, 'degree_name': 'PhD', 'field_of_study': None}]",[],[],[],[],[],"[{'name': 'The Law and Jurisprudence of the International Criminal Tribunals and Courts.
